CustomField.description: Checks to see if the account is a Smile Source Partner or if their Management System is a CareStream System (Softdent, WinOMS, PracticeWorks or Orthotrac)
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "Carestream"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "Alpha"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "Cobb"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "Computer Age"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "Datatrac"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "DentalMac"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "Exact Dental"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "Infologic"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "Intellident"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "KComp"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "PatientBase"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "Practice Outlook"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "OMS Comp Navigator"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "Rovak"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "OPMS"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "OrthoSoft"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__r.Name , "OrthoWare"), CONTAINS(Practice_Management_Software__c , "WinOMS"), CONTAINS( Practice_Management_Software__c , "PracticeWorks"), CONTAINS(Practice_Management_Software__c , "OrthoTrac"), CONTAINS( RecurSoft__Primary_Partner__r.Name , "Smile Source" ), CONTAINS( RecurSoft__Secondary_Partner__r.Name , "Smile Source" )),FALSE,TRUE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Customer is eligible for Singular Payments (in-office processing) if this is checked
CustomField.label: Eligible for Singular
